customMethod.name: lista
customMethod.sql: select * from carinsurance_t a left join findcar_t b on a.orderno=b.ordernumber left join userinfo_t c on b.userdid=c.d_id where a.insuranceprice=#{price} and b.paystatus=#{status}

customMethod.name: listb
customMethod.sql: select * from carinsurance_t a left join findcar_t b on a.orderno=b.ordernumber left join userinfo_t c on b.userdid=c.d_id where a.insuranceprice=#{price} and b.paystatus=#{status}
